Hi Ron, I remember a couple of years ago in Japan you mentioned you had a p=
lethora of kogai and would perhaps be pruning your collection. Do you by an=
y chance have a Mino-bori kogai that is cluttering up the drawer? Anyone el=
se? Of good good to very good quality. It is true that once this site and o=
thers had a lot of traffic. Learned a lot over time here. John Stuart
